wikipedia_page.main: Jethro Sheeran, known professionally as Alonestar, is a musician, music producer and fashion model from Bristol, United Kingdom. He has collaborated with a number of artists, including Ed Sheeran (his cousin), Lil Wayne, Macy Gray, Royce Da 5'9", Akon, DaBaby, Freeway, Popcaan. Snoop Dogg, Michael Jackson, The Game, Massive Attack, Capleton, Shatta Wale, Amy Winehouse and Trippe Redd.
